00011 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
00012  * Colour generator factory specialisation for the istream class, creating *
00013  * a colour generator instance from a filestream.                          *
00014  *                                                                         *
00015  * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00016

00018 #include <Camgen/static_conf.h>
00019 #include <Camgen/uni_cols.h>
00020 #include <Camgen/qcd_cols.h>

00022 namespace Camorra

00025 
00026     template<class model_t,std::size_t N_in,std::size_t N_out,class rng_t,bool q=model_t::coloured>class colour_generator_factory;
00027 
00030 
00031     template<class model_t,std::size_t N_in,std::size_t N_out,class rng_t>class colour_generator_factory<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t,false>
00032     {
00033         public:
00034 
00035             typedef colour_generator<typename model_t::value_type,N_in,N_out,false> generator_type;
00036             typedef colour_generators::type generator_tag;
00037 
00038             static generator_type* create_instance(typename CM_algorithm<model_t,N_in,N_out>::tree_iterator it)
00039             {
00040                 return NULL;
00041             }
00042             static generator_type* create_instance(typename CM_algorithm<model_t,N_in,N_out>::tree_iterator it,generator_tag tag)
00043             {
00044                 return NULL;
00045             }
00046             static generator_type* create_instance(typename CM_algorithm<model_t,N_in,N_out>::tree_iterator it,std::istream& is)
00047             {
00048                 std::string initline,endline;
00049                 while(initline!="</colgen>" and !is.eof())
00050                 {
00051                     std::getline(is,initline);
00052                 }
00053                 if(is.eof())
00054                 {
00055                     LOG(warning)<<"End of file reached before final tag detected..."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00056                     return NULL;
00057                 }
00058                 return NULL;
00059             }
00060     };
00061 
00063 
00064     template<class model_t,std::size_t N_in,std::size_t N_out,class rng_t>class colour_generator_factory<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t,true>
00065     {
00066         public:
00067 
00068             typedef typename model_t::value_type value_type;
00069             typedef colour_generator<value_type,N_in,N_out,model_t::continuous_colours> generator_type;
00070             typedef colour_generators::type generator_tag;
00071 
00072             static const bool cc=model_t::continuous_colours;
00073 
00076 
00077             static generator_type* create_instance(typename CM_algorithm<model_t,N_in,N_out>::tree_iterator it)
00078             {
00079                 return create_instance(it,colour_generator_type());
00080             }
00081 
00084 
00085             static generator_type* create_instance(typename CM_algorithm<model_t,N_in,N_out>::tree_iterator it,generator_tag tag)
00086             {
00087                 switch(tag)
00088                 {
00089                     case colour_generators::uniform:
00090                         return uniform_colours<value_type,N_in,N_out,rng_t,cc>::template create_instance<model_t>(it);
00091                     case colour_generators::summation:
00092                         return colour_summer<value_type,N_in,N_out,cc>::template create_instance<model_t>(it);
00093                     case colour_generators::flow_sampling:
00094                         if(static_eq<typename model_t::colour_treatment,adjoint>::value)
00095                         {
00096                             return adjoint_QCD<value_type,N_in,N_out,model_t::N_c,rng_t,cc>::template create_instance<model_t>(it);
00097                         }
00098                         else if(static_eq<typename model_t::colour_treatment,colour_flow>::value)
00099                         {
00100                             return colour_flow_QCD<value_type,N_in,N_out,model_t::N_c,rng_t,cc>::template create_instance<model_t>(it);
00101                         }
00102                         else
00103                         {
00104                             return NULL;
00105                         }
00106                     default:
00107                         return NULL;
00108                 }
00109             }
00110 
00113 
00114             static generator_type* create_instance(typename CM_algorithm<model_t,N_in,N_out>::tree_iterator it,std::istream& is)
00115             {
00116                 std::string initline,endline;
00117                 while(initline!="<colgen>" and !is.eof())
00118                 {
00119                     std::getline(is,initline);
00120                 }
00121                 if(is.eof())
00122                 {
00123                     LOG(warning)<<"End of file reached before initial data are read..."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00124                     return NULL;
00125                 }
00126                 generator_type* result;
00127                 std::string type;
00128                 is>>type;
00129                 if(type=="sum")
00130                 {
00131                     result=colour_summer<value_type,N_in,N_out,cc>::template create_instance<model_t>(it);
00132                 }
00133                 else if(type=="uniform")
00134                 {
00135                     result=uniform_colours<value_type,N_in,N_out,rng_t,cc>::template create_instance<model_t>(it);
00136                 }
00137                 else if(type=="qcd")
00138                 {
00139                     if(static_eq<typename model_t::colour_treatment,adjoint>::value)
00140                     {
00141                         result=adjoint_QCD<value_type,N_in,N_out,model_t::N_c,rng_t,cc>::template create_instance<model_t>(it);
00142                     }
00143                     else if(static_eq<typename model_t::colour_treatment,colour_flow>::value)
00144                     {
00145                         result=colour_flow_QCD<value_type,N_in,N_out,model_t::N_c,rng_t,cc>::template create_instance<model_t>(it);
00146                     }
00147                     else
00148                     {
00149                         result=NULL;
00150                     }
00151                 }
00152                 else
00153                 {
00154                     LOG(warning)<<"colour generator type "<<type<<" not recognised..."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00155                     result=NULL;
00156                 }
00157                 if(result!=NULL)
00158                 {
00159                     result->load(is);
00160                 }
00161                 do
00162                 {
00163                     std::getline(is,endline);
00164                 }
00165                 while(endline!="</colgen>" and !is.eof());
00166                 return result;
00167             }
00168     };
00169     template<class model_t,std::size_t N_in,std::size_t N_out,class rng_t>const bool colour_generator_factory<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t,true>::cc;
00170 }
